amendment.description: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide 100 percent reimbursement for medical assistance provided to a Native Hawaiian through a Federally-qualified health center or a Native Hawaiian care system.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1039 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 1039 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S8424; text: CR S8424) To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide 100 percent reimbursement for medical assistance provided to a Native Hawaiian through a Federally-qualified health center or a Native Hawaiian care system.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1039 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Inouye.
